The new 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Walter P. Chrysler Town& Country remain key parts of our revival plan, Sergio Marchionne told more than 1,200 employees in the audience. You give keys to the city to people who have done great things for the City of Dallas or heroes who have done outstanding things to help the citizens of Dallas. I'm not quite sure how Michael Vick fits that profile says Katrina Pierson . Reverend Marion Barnett supports Dwaine Caraway and says it was appropriate to give Michael Vick the key. Consumer Watchdog, a group which has been highly critical of Google's privacy practices, condemned the agreement to settle the issue through negotiations and called for congressional hearings on the subject. The details of the biggest privacy breach in history shouldn't be settled in secret, said John Simpson of Consumer Watchdog. "This makes it clear why Google CEO Eric Schmidt needs to testify under oath before Congress about Wi-Spy." Google pledged to strengthen its privacy and security practices after its

defense, many top Republicans have suggested yanking money from a variety of domestic programs, including NPR, the National Endowment for the Arts and Amtrak, as possible answers to the country's financial woes. Nice political chatter, but that doesn't do it, Colin Powell said. He also slammed Republican leaders for playing politics with the budget, without offering what he said were real solutions. ". As Google's new chief executive, Page will lead product development and technology strategy, along with all day-to-day operations of the firm. Sergey Brin , who co-founded Google with Page, will devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. His title will remain co-founder. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said that he had been working with Page and Sergey Brin on ways to simplify Google's management structure and quicken decision making.

Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters.( See photos of Egypt convulsed by protest.)
